EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-04-Minneapolis-ESB.ES-2017-10-11-Minneapolis-Attended-TY.ES-2017-10-
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining Turbonomic and Datalink!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We wanted to personally thank you for joining the Turbonomic and Datalink on Tuesday evening at Murray's Steakhouse. We had a great time getting to know you and sharing our hybrid cloud story. If there is any help that we can provide to you here at Turbonomic, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.
On behalf of Turbonomic and Datalink - thank you!
We hope to see you again soon! Tami
Tami Pearlstein Marketing Program Manager - Central Turbonomic, Inc. 508-397-6147
